title: Example- and Problem-Based Online Learning Course for Improving Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science knowledge and secondary-level mathematics proficiency
context.additional_context: Real-time video lectures conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, with customized learning design for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a three-stage framework (problem definition-strategy development-execution and verification) to systematically analyze given science problems
Learners can identify problem-solving strategies by type with 80% accuracy through example-based learning
Learners can improve learning efficiency by 20% by selecting appropriate ratios of examples to problem-solving exercises (e.g., 40:60) in self-directed learning environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
